name: chen_test_of_faith

affects:
ABILITY: Unit Target
AFFECTS: Allied Units
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
desc: Teleports an allied unit back to the base.  Creeps are teleported instantly, while Heroes have a delay before teleporting. If cast on Chen, all units controlled by Chen through Holy Persuasion will be teleported to him after a delay.
cmb:
200/200/200/200
24
name: chen_test_of_faith_teleport

desc:
Chen takes control of an enemy or neutral creep. If the persuaded creep's base health is naturally below the health minimum, its base health will be raised to the health minimum.
Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter, allowing Chen to persuade Ancient Creeps. The number of Ancient Creeps that can be persuaded is based on the level of Hand of God.
notes:
You may only cast this ability on Ancient Creeps with Aghanim's Scepter.
When persuading a new creep above your max unit count, the oldest persuaded unit will die.
cmb:
100/100/100/100
30/26/22/18
lore: Although they may not be knights, Chen incorporates beasts into the Fold in the same way he himself was converted.
name: chen_holy_persuasion

affects:
ABILITY: No Target
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
desc:
Fully regenerates any creeps under Chen's control and heals all allied heroes on the map.
Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

lore: Using the mental link with his thralls, Chen calls down restoration and well-being to those who share his fanaticism.
name: chen_hand_of_god
